description.en: Stader's liquid staking solution on Near Network allows users to stake Near and get a fungible liquid token (NearX) back that shows their claim to the underlying staked assets. We work with the ecosystem projects to ensure wide usability of these tokens on DEXs, lending/borrowing protocols, yield aggregators and more.
